verbs.description: [ARG0: The White House] [V: circulated] [ARG1: a photo of President Trump holding a larger - than - life letter from the North Korean leader Friday]
The White House circulated a photo of [ARG0: President Trump] [V: holding] [ARG1: a larger - than - life letter] [ARG2: from the North Korean leader] [ARGM-TMP: Friday]
